pages.about: About Craft Haven - Creative Courses and Workshops About us Services Gallery Advantages Pricelist Products Reviews Blog Team Contact us Home About us Services Gallery Advantages Pricelist Products Reviews Blog Team Contact us About CraftHaven At CraftHaven, we believe that everyone has an artistic side waiting to be unleashed. Our mission is to provide a nurturing and inspiring environment where creativity can flourish. Through our diverse range of expertly-led workshops and masterclasses, we help individuals of all skill levels explore and enhance their artistic talents. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced artist, CraftHaven is your sanctuary for creativity, learning, and personal growth. Join us and become part of a vibrant community of passionate creators. Our team of seasoned instructors brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to every class, ensuring personalized guidance and support for each student. We offer courses in painting, pottery, jewelry making, sculpture, textile arts, and photography, all designed to ignite your passion and expand your skills. At CraftHaven, we are committed to fostering a collaborative and inclusive atmosphere where creativity knows no bounds. Step into CraftHaven and embark on a transformative journey of artistic discovery. 50 Courses 20 Instructors 100 Workshops 20 Years Reviews What our clients say Jane Doe Graphic Designer CraftHaven's workshops have completely transformed my approach to art. The instructors are incredibly knowledgeable and supportive. Highly recommend! John Smith Art Enthusiast I've attended several masterclasses at CraftHaven, and each one has been a fantastic experience. The environment is inspiring, and the skills I've learned are invaluable. Emily Johnson Professional Photographer CraftHaven has been a wonderful place for me to refine my photography skills. The workshops are well-structured and the feedback from instructors is invaluable. I can't wait to join more classes! Creative Insights Explore Tips, Techniques, and Stories from the CraftHaven Community 01.07.2024 New Pottery Workshop Series Announced We are excited to announce a new series of pottery workshops starting this month. Join us to learn various pottery techniques and create your own masterpieces. 15.07.2024 Guest Artist Seminar: Painting with Emily Green Renowned artist Emily Green will be hosting a special seminar on painting techniques. Don't miss this opportunity to learn from one of the best in the field. 25.07.2024 Summer Art Fair: Showcasing Student Works Join us at the Summer Art Fair to see the amazing works created by our talented students. The event will feature a variety of artworks, live demonstrations, and more. Meet Our Team Get to Know the Faces Behind CraftHaven Emily Davis Sophia Roberts Jessica Parker Privacy Home About us Services Gallery Advantages Pricelist Products Reviews Blog Team Contact us

pages.policy: Privacy Policy - Craft Haven About us Services Gallery Advantages Pricelist Products Reviews Blog Team Contact us Home About us Services Gallery Advantages Pricelist Products Reviews Blog Team Contact us Privacy Policy - CraftHaven Introduction Welcome to Craft Haven's Privacy Policy. This Privacy Policy governs the manner in which Craft Haven collects, uses, maintains, and discloses information collected from users (each, a "User") of the crafthaven.com website ("Site"). This privacy policy applies to the Site and all products and services offered by Craft Haven. Use of Collected Information Craft Haven may collect and use Users personal information for the following purposes: - To improve customer service Information you provide helps us respond to your customer service requests and support needs more efficiently. - To personalize user experience We may use information in the aggregate to understand how our Users as a group use the services and resources provided on our Site. - To improve our Site We may use feedback you provide to improve our products and services. - To process payments We may use the information Users provide about themselves when placing an order only to provide service to that order. We do not share this information with outside parties except to the extent necessary to provide the service. - To send periodic emails We may use the email address to send User information and updates pertaining to their order. It may also be used to respond to their inquiries, questions, and/or other requests. Protection of Information We adopt appropriate data collection, storage, and processing practices and security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your personal information, username, password, transaction information, and data stored on our Site. Sharing Your Personal Information We do not sell, trade, or rent Users personal identification information to others. We may share generic aggregated demographic information not linked to any personal identification information regarding visitors and users with our business partners, trusted affiliates, and advertisers for the purposes outlined above. Third Party Websites Users may find advertising or other content on our Site that link to the sites and services of our partners, suppliers, advertisers, sponsors, licensors and other third parties. We do not control the content or links that appear on these sites and are not responsible for the practices employed by websites linked to or from our Site. In addition, these sites or services, including their content and links, may be constantly changing. These sites and services may have their own privacy policies and customer service policies. Browsing and interaction on any other website, including websites which have a link to our Site, is subject to that website's own terms and policies. Changes to This Privacy Policy Craft Haven has the discretion to update this privacy policy at any time. When we do, we will revise the updated date at the bottom of this page. We encourage Users to frequently check this page for any changes to stay informed about how we are helping to protect the personal information we collect. You acknowledge and agree that it is your responsibility to review this privacy policy periodically and become aware of modifications. Information Collection and Use Craft Haven collects personal information from Users when they visit our website, register on the site, place an order, subscribe to the newsletter, respond to a survey, fill out a form, and engage in other activities, services, features or resources we make available on our Site. This information may include name, email address, mailing address, phone number, payment details, and other personal data necessary to provide our services. Data Usage We use the collected information for various purposes, including processing transactions, fulfilling orders, providing customer support, improving our services, sending promotional communications, and complying with legal obligations. Your information helps us personalize your experience and effectively respond to your requests and inquiries. Retention of Information Craft Haven retains personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. We may retain and use your information to comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements. Data Protection Rights You have the right to access, update, correct, and delete your personal information held by Craft Haven. You can exercise these rights by contacting us directly. We will respond to your request within a reasonable timeframe and in accordance with applicable data protection laws. Security Measures Craft Haven implements appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. We regularly review our security practices and update them as necessary to ensure the confidentiality and integrity of your data. Marketing Communications Craft Haven may send you marketing communications and promotional offers based on your preferences and consent. You can opt-out of receiving these communications at any time by following the unsubscribe instructions provided in the emails or contacting us directly. Opting out of marketing communications does not affect transactional communications related to your account or orders. International Data Transfers Your personal information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own, where data protection laws may differ. Craft Haven takes measures to ensure that any international transfers of personal data comply with applicable legal requirements for data protection and security. Third-Party Services Craft Haven may use third-party services to facilitate our operations and improve our services. These third-party service providers have access to your personal information only to perform tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose. However, we are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties, and you should review their privacy policies before using their services. Data Breach Notification In the event of a data breach that compromises the security of your personal information, Craft Haven will notify you and relevant authorities as required by law. We will take immediate action to mitigate the effects of the breach and inform you of steps you can take to protect yourself from potential harm. User Responsibilities Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials and ensuring the security of their personal information when using Craft Haven's services. You should notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other security breach. Legal Basis for Processing Craft Haven processes personal information on lawful bases, including consent, contractual necessity, legal obligations, vital interests, legitimate interests, and public interest. We ensure that our data processing activities comply with applicable laws and respect your rights as a data subject. Contact Information If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or the handling of your personal information by Craft Haven, please contact us at crafthaven@gmail.com. We will respond to your inquiries and address your concerns promptly. Privacy Home About us Services Gallery Advantages Pricelist Products Reviews Blog Team Contact us
pages.thank: Thank You - Craft Haven Thank You for Contacting Craft Haven! Thank you for reaching out to Craft Haven! We have received your message and will get back to you shortly. Your interest in our creative courses and workshops is greatly appreciated. In the meantime, feel free to explore more about Craft Haven and our offerings on our website. If you have any urgent inquiries, please don't hesitate to contact us directly. We look forward to connecting with you soon! Home
